title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 28
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 28
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Analogic (ALOG). Analogic Inc.'s shares are headed for their biggest gain since 2014 after the provider of medical and security equipment agreed to a partnership with American Airlines. They will collaborate on rolling out Analogic's CT scanners for screening carry-on bags. American committed itself to buying "multiple units" of the scanners, the companies said in a statement. Other terms weren't disclosed.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
